Translations.Text: Ibarahima balalena, ‘he prerita pheresatagana! Tomadera bisesa kaja [1] ki?’
Tara balala, ‘niscaya amara eka aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi
Yate tadera upara niksepa kari matira sakta dhela
ya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya cihnita apanara rabera kacha theke [1].’
Atahpara sekhane yesaba mumina chila amara taderake bera kare niye asalama
Tabe amara sekhane ekati paribara chara ara kono musalima pa'ini
Ara yara marmambhada sastike bhaya kare amara tadera jan'ya okhane ekati nidarsana rekhechi
Ara nidarsana rekhechi musara brttante'o, yakhana amara take spasta pramanasaha phira’a'unera kache pathalama
takhana se ksamatara ahankare mukha phiriye nila [1] ebam balala, ‘e byakti haya eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada.’
Kaje'i amara take o tara dalabalake sasti dilama ebam tadera sagare niksepa karalama, ara se chila tiraskrta
Ara nidarsana rayeche ‘adera ghatanate'o, yakhana amara tadera birud'dhe prerana karechilama akalyanakara bayu
eta ya kichura upara diye baye giyechila take'i yena parinata karala curna-bicurna dhbansastupe
Ara'o nidarsana rayeche samudera brttante'o, yakhana taderake bala hayechila, ‘bhoga kare na'o ekati nidrsta kala.’
Atahpara tara tadera rabera adesa manate ahankara karala; phale taderake pakara'o karala bajra [1] ebam tara ta dekhachila
Atahpara tara uthe damrate parala na ebam pratirodha karate'o parala na
Ara (dhbansa karechilama) edera age nuhera sampradayake, niscaya tara chila phaseka sampradaya
Ara asamana amara ta nirmana karechi amadera ksamata bale [1] ebam amara niscaya'i mahasamprasaranakari
Ara yamina, amara take bichiye diyechi, atahpara kata sundara byabasthapanakari [1] (amara)
ara pratyeka bastu amara srsti karechi joraya joraya [1], yate tomara upadesa grahana kara
Ata'eba, tomara allahara dike dhabita ha'o [1]. Niscaya ami tomadera prati allahara paksa theke eka spasta satarkakari
Ara tomara allahara sathe kono ilah‌ sthira karo na; ami tomadera prati allaha prerita eka spasta satarkakari
Ebhabe tadera purbabatidera kache yakhana'i kono rasula esechena tara'i take baleche, ’e to eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada!’
Tara ki eke aparake e mantrana'i diye eseche? Baram era simalajayanakari sampradaya
Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna, ete apani tiraskrta habena na
Ara apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana niscaya upadesa muminadera upakare ase
Ara ami srsti karechi jina ebam manusake ejan'ye'i ye, tara kebala amara ibadata karabe
Ami tadera kacha theke kono riyika ca'i na ebam eta'o ca'i na ye, tara amake kha'oyabe
Niscaya allaha, tini'i to riyikadata, prabala saktidhara, parakramasali
Sutaram yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera samamatabalambidera anurupa prapya (sasti). Kaje'i tara etara jan'ya amara kache yena tarahuro na kare
Ata'eba, yara kuphari kareche tadera jan'ya durbhoga se dinera, ye dinera bisaye taderake satarka kara hayeche
Sapatha tura parbatera
sapatha kitabera, ya likhita ache
unmukta pataya
sapatha bayatula ma’murera
sapatha samunnata chadera
sapatha udbelita sagarera
niscaya apanara rabera sasti abasyambhabi
etara nibaranakari ke'u ne'i
Yedina asamana andolita habe prabalabhabe
ara parbata paribhramana karabe druta
ataheba durbhoga se dina mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
Yara khelara chale asara kajakarme lipta thake
yedina taderake dhakka marate marate niye ya'oya habe jahannamera agunera dike
‘eta'i se aguna yake tomara mithya mane karate.’
Eta ki tabe jadu? Na ki tomara dekhate paccha na
tomara ete dagdha ha'o, atahpara tomara dhairya dharana kara athaba dhairya dharana na kara, ubhaya'i tomadera jan'ya samana. Tomara ya karate tara'i pratiphala tomaderake deya hacche
Niscaya muttakira thakabe jannate o arama-ayese
tadera raba taderake ya diyechena tara ta upabhoga karabe ebam tadera raba taderake raksa karechena jalanta agunera sasti theke
‘Tomara ya karate tara pratiphala sbarupa tomara trptira sathe panahara karate thaka [1].’
Tara basabe srenibad'dhabhabe sajjita asane helana diye; ara amara tadera milana ghataba dagara cokhabisista hurera sange

ara yara imana ane, ara tadera santana-santati imane tadera anugami haya, amara tadera sathe milita karaba tadera santana-santatike [1] ebam tadera karmaphala amara ekatu'o kamabo na [2]; pryatyeka byakti nija krtakarmera jan'ya dayi
Ara amara taderake bariye deba phalamula ebam gosata ya tara kamana karabe
Sekhane tara parasparera madhye adana-pradana karate thakabe panapatra, sekhane thakabe na kono asara katha-barta, thakabe na kono papakaja'o
Ara tadera sebaya carapase ghuraghuri karabe kisorera, tara yena suraksita mukta
Ara tara eke an'yera dike phire jijnesa karabe
tara balabe, niscaya age amara paribara-parijanera madhye sankita abasthaya chilama
Atahpara amadera prati allaha anugraha karechena ebam amaderake agunera sasti theke raksa karechena
Niscaya amara age'o allahake dakatama, niscaya tini krpamaya, parama dayalu
Ata'eba apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana, apanara rabera anugrahe apani ganaka nana, unmada'o nana
Naki tara bale, ‘se ekajana kabi? Amara tara mrtyura pratiksa karachi
Baluna, ‘tomara pratiksa kara, ami'o tomadera sathe pratiksakaridera antarbhukta [1].’
Naki tadera bibeka-bud'dhi taderake e adesa dicche, baram tara eka simalanghanakari sampradaya
Naki tara bale, ‘e kura'ana se baniye baleche?’ Baram tara imana anabe na
Ata'eba, tara yadi satyabadi haya tabe etara mata kono bani niye asuka na
tara ki srasta chara srsti hayeche, na tara nijera'i srasta
naki tara asamanasamuha o yamina srsti kareche? Baram tara drrha bisbasa kare na
Apanara rabera guptabhandara ki tadera kache rayeche, naki tara e sabakichura niyanta
naki tadera kono simri ache yate arohana kare tara sune thake? Thakale tadera se srota suspasta pramana niye asuka
tabe ki kan'ya santana tamra jan'ya ebam putra santana tomadera jan'ya
tabe ki apani tadera kache parisramika cacchena ye, tara etake ekati durbaha bojha mane kare
naki gayebi bisaye tadera kono jnana ache ye, tara ta likhache
naki tara kono sarayantra karate caya? Pariname yara kuphari kare tara'i habe sarayantrera sikara
Naki allaha chara odera an'ya kono ilaha ache? Tara ye sirka sthira kare allah‌ ta theke pabitra
ara tara akasera kono khanda bhenge parate dekhale balabe, ‘eta to eka punjibhuta megha.’
Ata'eba, taderake chere dina se dina paryanta, yedina tara bajraghate hatacetana habe
Sedina tadera sarayantra kono kaje asabe na ebam taderake sahayya'o kara habe na
Ara niscaya yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche echara aro sasti. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i ta jane na

ara apani dhairyadharana karuna apanara rabera sid'dhantera upara; niscaya apani amadera caksura samane'i rayechena [1]. Apani apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna yakhana apani dandayamana hana
ara tamra pabitrata ghosana karuna ratera bela [1] o tarakara asta gamanera para
Sapatha naksatrera, yakhana ta haya astamita
tomadera sangi [1] bibhranta naya, bipathagami'o naya
ara tini managara katha balena na
Tato kebala ohi, ya tara prati ohirupe prerita haya
take siksa dana karechena pracanda saktisali
saundaryapurna satta [1]. Atahpara tini sthira hayechilena
ara tini chilena urdhbadigante
tarapara tini tara kachakachi halena, atahpara khuba kachakachi
Phale tadera madhye du dhanukera byabadhana ra'ila athaba tara'o kama
Takhana allah‌ tamra bandara prati ya ohi karara ta ohi karalena
ya tini dekhechena, tara antahkarana ta mithya baleni
tini ya dekhechena tomara ki se bisaye tamra sange bitarka karabe
ara abasya'i tini take arekabara dekhechilena
‘sidaratula muntaha’ tatha prantabarti kula gacha era kache
yara kache jannatula ma’oya [1] abasthita
Yakhana kula gachatike ya acchadita karara ta acchadita karechila
tara drsti bibhrama hayani, drsti laksyacyuta'o hayani
Abasya'i tini tara rabera mahana nidarsanabalira kichu dekhechilena
ata'eba, tomara amake jana'o ‘lata’ o ‘uyaya' samparke
ebam trtiya arekati ‘manata’ samparke
tabe ki tomadera jan'ya putra santana ebam allahara jan'ya kan'ya santana
e rakama bantana to asangata

Egulo kichu nama matra ya tomara o tomadera purbapurusara rekhecha, yara samarthane allah‌ kono dalilapramana nayila karenani. Tara to anumana ebam nijedera prabrttira'i anusarana kare, athaca tadera kache tadera rabera paksa theke hedayata eseche
Manusa ya caya ta'i ki se paya
bastutah akherata o duniya allah‌ra'i
ara asamanasamuhe bahu phirisata rayeche; tadera suparisa kichumatra phalaprasu habe na, tabe allahara anumatira para, yara jan'ya tini icche karena o yara prati tini santusta
Niscaya yara akhiratera upara imana ane na tara'i naribacaka nama diye thake phirisataderake
athaca e bisaye tadera kono jnana'i ne'i, tara to sudhu anumanera'i anusarana kare; ara niscaya anumana satyera mokabilaya kona'i kaje ase na
Ata'eba, apani take upeksa kare caluna ye amadera smarana [1] theke bimukha haya ebam kebala duniyara jibana'i kamana kare
Eta'i tadera jnanera sesa sima. Niscaya apanara raba, tini'i bhala janena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini'i bhala janena ke hedayatapraapta hayeche

Ara asamanasamuhe ya kichu ache o yamine ya kichu ache ta allah‌ra'i. Yate tini tadera kajera pratiphala dite parena yara manda kaja kare ebam taderake tini uttama puraskara dite parena yara satkaja kare

yara birata thake gurutara papa o aslila kaja theke, chotakhata aparadha byatita [1]. Niscaya apanara rabera ksama aparisima; tini tomadera samparke samyaka abagata---yakhana tini tomaderake srsti karechilena mati hate ebam yakhana tomara matrgarbhe bhrunarupe chile. Ata'eba, tomara atmaprasansa karo na, tini'i samyaka janena tara samparke ye taka'oya abalambana kareche
Apani ki dekhechena se byaktike ye mukha phiriye neya
ebam dana kare saman'ya'i, pare bandha kare deya
tara kache ki gayebera jnana ache ye, se pratyaksa kare
naki take janano hayani ya ache musara sahiphaya
ebam ibarahimera sahiphaya [1], yini purna karechilena (tara angikara)
ta e'i ye [1], kono bojha bahanakari an'yera bojha bahana karabe na
ara e'i ye, manusa ta'i paya ya se cesta kare
ara e'i ye, tara pracestara phala sighra'i dekha yabe
tarapara take deya habe purna pratidana
ara e'i ye, sabara sesa gantabya to apanara rabera kache
ara e'i ye, tini'i hasana ebam tini'i kamdana
ara e'i ye, tini'i marena ebam tini'i bamcana
ara e'i ye, tini'i srsti karena yugala---purusa o nari
sukrabindu hate, yakhana ta sthalita haya
ara e'i ye, punarut'thana ghatanora dayitba tamra'i
ara e'i ye, tini'i abhabamukta karena ebam sampada dana karena
ara e'i ye, tini si’ra naksatrera raba
Ara e'i ye, tini'i pracina ‘ada sampradayake dhbansa karechilena
Ebam samuda sampradayake'o [1]; atahpara ka'uke'o tini baki rakhenani
ara edera age nuhera sampradayake'o, niscaya tara chila atyanta yalima o carama abadhya
Ara tini ultano abasabhumike niksepa karechilena
Atahpara setake acchanna karala ya acchanna karara
sutaram (he manusa!) Tumi tomara rabera kon‌ anugraha samparke sandeha posana karabe
e nabi'o [1] atitera satarkakaridera mata'i eka satarkakari
Kiyamata asanna
allaha chara ke'u'i eta prakasa karate saksama naya
Tomara ki e kathaya bismaya bodha karacha
ara hasi-thatta karacha! Ebam kamdacho na
ara tomara udasina
ata'eba allahake sajada kara ebam tamra ‘ibadata kara
Kiyamata kachakachi hayeche [1], ara camda bidirna hayeche
ara tara kono nidarsana dekhale mukha phiriye neya ebam bale, ‘eta to ciracarita jadu [1].’
Ara tara mithyaropa kare ebam nija kheyala –khusira anusarana kare, athaca pratiti bisaya'i sesa lakse paumchabe
Ara tadera kache eseche sambadasamuha, yate ache kathora nisedhajna
eta paripurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana tadera kono kaje lageni
Ata'eba, apani tadera upeksa karuna. (Smarana karuna) yedina ah‌banakari ah‌bana karabe eka bhayabaha parinamera dike
apamane abanamita netre [1] sedina tara kabara hate bera habe, mane habe yena tara biksipta pangapala
tara ahbanakarira dike chute asabe bhita-bihbala haye [1]. Kaphirara balabe, ‘bara'i kathina e dina.’
Edera age nuhera sampradaya'o mithyaropa karechila--- sutaram tara amadera bandara prati mithyaropa karechila ara balechila, ’pagala’, ara take bhiti pradarsana kara hayechila
Takhana tini tamra rabake ahabana kare balechilena, ‘niscaya ami asahaya, ata'eba apani pratibidhana karuna.’
Phale amara unmukta kare dilama akasera dbarasamuha prabala barsanasila baridharara madhyame
ebam mati theke utsarita karalama jharnasamuha; phale samasta pani milita hala eka parikalpana anusare
ara nuhake amara arohana karalama katha o perega nirmita eka nauyane
ya calata amadera cokhera samane; eta puraskara tamra jan'ya, yara sathe kuphari kara hayechila
Ara abasya'i amara etake rekhe diyechi eka nidarsanarupe [1]; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
sutaram ki kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya [1], eta'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
‘ada sampradaya mithyaropa karechila, phale kirupa chila amara sasti o satarkabani
niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama eka pracanda sitala jharoha'oya nirabacchinna amangala dine
ta manusake utkhata karechila yena tara utpatita khejura gachera kanda
Ata'eba ki kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
samuda sampradaya satarkakaridera prati mithyaropa karechila
atahpara tara balechila, ‘amara ki amadera'i eka byaktira anusarana karaba? Tabe to amara pathabhrastataya ebam unmattataya patita haba
‘Amadera madhye ki tara'i prati yikara [1] pathano hayeche? Na, se to ekajana mithyabadi, dambhika [2].’
Agami kala ora abasya'i janabe, ke mithyabadi, dambhika
Niscaya amara tadera pariksara jan'ya ustri pathiyechi, ata'eba apani tadera acarana laksya karuna ebam dhairyasila hona
Ara taderake janiye dina ye, tadera madhye pani bantana nirdharita ebam panira ansera jan'ya pratyeke upasthita habe palakrame
Atahpara tara tadera sangike dakala, phale se setake (ustri) dhare hatya karala
Ata'eba kirupa kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama eka birata a'oyaja; phale tara haye gela khoyara prastutakarira bikhandita sulka kharera n'yaya
Ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
luta sampradaya mithyaropa karechila satarkakaridera prati
niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama pathara bahanakari pracanda jhatika, kintu luta paribarera upara naya; taderake amara ud'dhara karechilama ratera sesanse
amadera paksa theke anugrahasbarupa; ye krtajnata prakasa kare, amara ebhabe'i take puraskrta kare thaki
Ara abasya'i luta taderake satarka karechila amadera kathora pakara'o samparke; kintu tara satarkabani sambandhe bitanda [1] suru karala
Ara abasya'i tara lutera kacha theke tara mehamanaderake asaduddesye dabi karala [1], takhana amara tadera drsti sakti lopa kare dilama ebam balalama, ‘asbadana kara amara sasti ebam bhitira parinama
Ara abasya'i pratyuse tadera upara biramahina sasti aghata karechila
Sutaram ‘asbadana kara amara sasti ebam bhitipradarsanera parinama.’
Ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
ara abasya'i phira’a'una sampradayera kache esechila satarkakari
tara amadera saba nidarsane mithyaropa karala, sutaram amara mahaparakramasali o sarbasaktimanarupe taderake pakara'o karalama
Tomadera madhyakara kaphirara ki tadera ceye bhala? Na ki tomadera abyahatira kono sanada rayeche purbabati kitabe
naki tara bale, ‘amara eka sanghabad'dha aparajeya dala? ’
E dala to sighra'i parajita habe ebam pitha dekhiye palabe
baram kiyamata tadera sastira nirdharita samaya. Ara kiyamata habe kathinatara o tiktakara
Niscaya aparadhira bibhranti o sastite rayeche
Yedina taderake upura kare tene niye ya'oya habe jahannamera dike; sedina bala habe, ‘jahannamera yantrana asbadana kara.’
Niscaya amara pratyeka kichu srsti karechi nirdharita parimape
ara amadera adesa to kebala ekati katha, cokhera palakera mata
Ara abasya'i amara dhbansa karechi tomadera mata dalaguloke. Ata'eba, upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
ara tara ya kareche sabakichu'i ache ‘amalanamaya’
ara chota bara saba kichu'i likhita ache
Niscaya muttakira thakabe baga-bagica o jharnadharara madhye
yathayogya asane, sarbasaktimana maha'adhipati (allah‌)ra sannidhye
Ara-rahamana
tini'i siksa diyechena kura'ana
tini'i srsti karechena manusa
tini'i take sikhiyechena bhasa
surya o camda abartana kare nirdharita hisebe
ara trnalata o brksadi sajada karache
ara asamana, tini take karechena samunnata ebam sthapana karechena damripalla
yate tomara simalajana na kara damripallaya
Ara tomara ojanera n'yayya mana pratisthita kara ebam ojane kama di'o na
Ara yamina, tini ta sthapana karechena srsta jibera jan'ya
ete rayeche phalamula o khejura gacha yara phala abaranayukta
ara ache khosa bisista dana [1] o sugandha phula
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe [1] mithyaropa karabe
manusake tini srsti karechena suska thanathane mati theke ya pora matira mata
ebam jinake srsti karechena nirdhuma agunera sikha theke
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
tini'i du'i udayacala o du'i astacalera raba
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kono anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
tini prabahita karena du'i samudra yara paraspara milita haya
Kintu tadera ubhayera madhye rayeche eka antarala ya tara atikrama karate pare na
kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
ubhaya samudra hate utpanna haya mukta o prabala
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kona anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
ara sagare bicaranasila parbatapramana nauyanasamuha tamra'i (niyantranadhina)
kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kona anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
bhuprsthe ya kichu ache sabakichu'i nasbara
ara abinasbara sudhu apanara rabera cehara [1], yini mahimamaya, mahanubhaba
kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kona anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
asamanasamuha o yamine yara ache saba'i tamra kache praathi [1], tini pratyaha gurutbapurna kaje rata
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
he manusa o jina! Amara acire'i tomadera (hisaba-nikasera) prati manonibesa karaba
kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
he jina o manaba sampradaya! Asamanasamuha o yaminera sima tomara yadi atikrama karate para atikrama kara, kintu tomara atikrama karate parabe na sanada chara
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
tomadera ubhayera prati prerita habe agunera sikha o dhumrapunja [1], takhana tomara pratirodha karate parabena
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
yedina akasa bidirna habe sedina ta raktima golapera mata lala camarara rupa dharana karabe
kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
atahpara sedina na manusake tara aparadha sambandhe jijnesa kara habe, na jinake
kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
Aparadhidera paricaya pa'oya yabe tadera laksana theke [1], atahpara taderake pakara'o kara habe mathara samanera cula o pa dhare
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kona anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
eta'i se jahannama, yate aparadhira mithyaropa karata
tara jahannamera agula o phutanta panira madhye ghuroghuri karabe
Kaje'i tomara ubhaye tomadera rabera kon‌ anugrahe mithyaropa karabe
ara ye tara rabera sam'mukhe upasthita ha'oyara bhaya rakhe, tara jan'ya rayeche duti udyana

Ata'eba apani apanara mahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna
Asamanasamuha o yamine ya kichu ache saba'i allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare [1]. Ara tini parakramasali, prajnamaya
Asamanasamuha o yaminera sarbamaya kartrtba tamra'i; tini jibana dana karena ebam mrtyu ghatana; ara tini'i sabakichura upara ksamatabana
Tini'i prathama o sesa; prakasya (upare) o gopana (nikate) ara tini sabakichu samparke samyaka abagata

Tini chaya dine asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena; tarapara tini ‘arasera upara uthechena. Tini janena ya kichu yamine prabesa kare ebam ya kichu ta theke bera haya, ara asamana theke ya kichu abatirna haya ebam tate ya kichu ukhita haya [1]. Ara tomara yekhane'i thaka na kena--tini tomadera sange achena, ara tomara ya kichu kara allaha tara samyaka drasta
Asamanasamuha o yaminera sarbamaya kartrtba tamra'i ebam allah‌ra'i dike saba bisaya pratyabartita habe
Tini'i ratake prabesa karana dine ara dinake prabesa karana rate ebam tini antarera bisayadi samparke samyaka abagata

Tomara allaha o tamra rasulera prati imana ana ebam allaha tomaderake ya kichura uttaradhikari karechena ta hate byaya kara. Atahpara tomadera madhye yara imana ane o byaya kare, tadera jan'ya rayeche mahapuraskara

Ara tomadera ki hala ye, tomara allahara upara imana ana na? Athaca rasula tomaderake tomadera rabera prati imana anara jan'ya dakachena, athaca allaha tomadera kacha theke angikara grahana karechena [1], yadi tomara imanadara ha'o
Tini'i tamra bandara prati suspasta ayata nayila karena, tomaderake andhakara hate alote anara jan'ya. Ara niscaya allah‌ tomadera prati karunamaya, parama dayalu

Ara tomadera ki halo ye, tomara allahara pathe byaya karacha na? Athaca asamanasamuha o yaminera mirasa [1] to allah‌ra'i. Tomadera madhye yara bijayera age byaya kareche [2] o yud'dha karache, tara (ebam parabartira) samana naya [3]. Tara maryadaya srestha tadera ceye yara parabarti kale byaya kareche o yud'dha kareche. Tabe allah‌ ubhayera jan'ya'i kalyanera pratisruti diyechena [4]. Ara tomara ya kara allah‌ se samparke sabisesa abahita
Emana ke ache ye allahake debe uttama rna? Tahale tini bahu guna etake brd'dhi karabena tara jan'ya. Ara tara jan'ya rayeche sam'manajanaka puruskara

Sedina apani dekhabena mumina nara-nariderake tadera samane o dane tadera nura chutate thakabe [1]. Bala habe, ‘aja tomadera jan'ya susambada jannatera, yara padadese nadi prabahita, sekhane tomara sthayi habe, eta'i to mahasaphalya.’

Sedina munaphika purusa o munaphika narira yara imana eneche balabe, ‘tomara amadera jan'ya ekatu thama, yate amara tomadera nurera kichu grahana karate pari.’ Bala habe, ‘tomara tomadera pichane phire ya'o o nurera sandhana kara.’ Tarapara ubhayera majhamajhi sthapita habe ekati pracira yate ekati daraja thakabe, yara bhitare thakabe rahamata ebam ba'ire thakabe sasti

Munaphikara muminaderake deke jijnesa karabe, ‘amara ki tomadera sange chilama na?’ Tara balabe, ‘hyam, kintu tomara nijera'i nijederake bipadagrasta karecha. Ara tomara pratiksa karechile, sandeha posana karechile ebam alika akankha tomaderake mohacchanna kare rekhechila, abasese allahara hukuma asala [1]. Ara mahaprataraka [2] tomaderake pratarita karechila allaha samparke.’

‘Sutaram aja tomadera kacha theke kono muktipana grahana kara habe na ebam yara kuphari karechila tadera kacha theke'o naya. Jahannama'i tomadera abasasthala, eta'i tomadera yogya [1]; ara kata nikrsta e pratyabartanasthala!’

Yara imana eneche tadera hrdaya ki allahara smarane ebam ye satya nayila hayeche tara jan'ya bigalita ha'oyara samaya aseni [1]? Ara tara yena tadera mata na haya yaderake age kitaba deya hayechila --- arahpara bahu kala atikranta ha'oyara para tadera antarasamuha kathina haye parechila. Ara tadera adhikansa'i phasika
Jene rakha ye, allah‌i jaminake tara mrtyura para punarjibita karena. Amara nidarsanagulo tomadera jan'ya suspastabhabe barnana karechi yate tomara bujhate para
Niscaya danasila purusagana o danasila narigana ebam allahake uttama rna dana kare taderake deya habe bahuguna besi ebam tadera jan'ya rayeche sam'manajanaka puraskara

Ara yara allah‌ o tamra rasulera prati imana ane, tara'i siddika [1]. Ara sahidgana; tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera rabera kache tadera prapya puraskara o nura [2]. Ara yara kuphari kareche ebam amadera nidarsanasamuhe mithyaropa kareche, tara'i jahannamera adhibasi

Tomara jene rakha, niscaya duniyara jibana khela-tamasa, krira – kautuka, jamkajamaka, parasparika garba –ahankara, dhana-sampada o santana –santatite pracurya labhera pratiyogita chara ara kichu naya [1]. Era upama halo brsti, yara utpanna sasya–sambhara krsakaderake camatkara kare, tarapara segulo sukiye yaya, phale apani ogulo pitabarna dekhate pana, abasese segulo khara–kutoya parinata haya. Ara akherate rayeche kathina sasti ebam allahara ksama o santusti. Ara duniyara jibana prataranara samagri chara kichu naya

Tomara agrani ha'o tomadera rabera ksama o se jannata labhera prayase, ya prasastataya asamana o yaminera prasastatara mata [1], ya prastuta kara hayeche tadera jan'ya yara allah‌ o tamra rasulaganera prati imana ane. Eta allahara anugraha, yake icche tini eta dana karena [2]; ara allaha maha'anugrahasila
Yamine ba byaktigatabhabe tomadera upara ye biparyaya'i ase ta sanghatita ha'oyara purbe'i amara ta kitabe lipibad'dha rekhechi [1]. Niscaya allahara pakse eta khuba sahaja

Eta e jan'ye ye, tomara ya hariyecha tate yena tomara bimarsa na ha'o ebam ya tini tomaderake diyechena tara jan'ya anandita na ha'o [1]. Niscaya allaha pachanda karena na kono ud'dhata - ahankariderake
yara karpanya kare o manusake karpanyera nirdesa deya ebam ye mukha phiriye neya se jene rakhuka niscaya allaha abhabamukta, cira prasansita

Abasya'i amara amadera rasulaganake pathiyechi spasta pramanasaha [1] ebam tadera sange diyechi kitaba o n'yayera palla, yate manusa subicara pratista [2] kare. Amara ara'o nayila karechi loha yate rayeche pracanda sakti ebam rayeche manusera jan'ya bahubidha kalyana [3]. Eta e jan'ye ye, allaha prakasa kare dena ke gayeba abasthaya'o tamke o tamra rasulaganake sahayya kare. Niscaya allah‌ maha saktimana, parakramasali

Ara abasya'i amara nuha ebam ibarahimake rasula rupe pathiyechilama ebam amara tadera bansadharaganera jan'ya sthira karechilama nabu'oyata o kitaba [1], kintu tadera alpa'i satpatha abalambana karechila. Ara tadera adhikansa'i phasika

Tarapara amara tadera pichane anugami karechilama amadera rasulaganake ebam anugami karechilama mara'iyama-tanaya isake, ara take amara diyechilama injila ebam tara anusaridera antare diyechilama karuna o daya [1]. Ara sann'yasabada [2]--- eta to tara nijera'i allahara santusti labhera jan'ya prabartana karechila. Amara taderake etara bidhana de'ini; athaca eta'o ora yathayathabhabe palana kareni [3]. Atahpara tadera madhye yara imana enechila, taderake amara diyechilama tadera puraskara. Ara tadera adhikansa'i chila phasika

He muminagana! Allahara taka'oya abalambala kara ebam tamra rasulera upara imana ana. Tini tamra anugrahe tomaderake debena dbiguna puruskara [1] ebam tini tomaderake debena nura, yara sahayye tomara calabe [2] ebam tini tomaderake ksama karabena. Ara allah‌ ksamasila, parama dayalu

Eta ejan'ye ye, kitabigana yena janate pare, allahara saman'yatama anugrahera upara'o odera kono adhikara ne'i [1]. Ara niscaya anugraha allahara ikhatiyare, yake icche take tini ta dana karena. Ara allaha maha anugrahasila
